wikipedia_page.main: George Cunningham Monteath Douglas (1826–1904) was a Scottish minister of the Free Church of Scotland who was Professor of Hebrew and the Old Testament at Glasgow Free Church College. He served as Moderator of the General Assembly to the Free Church in 1894/1895.

response: *George Douglas (1894)
